inair.app

Class IABaseLayeredNavigationLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • inair.app.IAChildLayout
        • inair.app.IABaseLayeredNavigationLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAController, IALayout

    public abstract class IABaseLayeredNavigationLayout
extends IAChildLayout

    Base class for layered navigation controller

    Should be used to handle all controller events on it's layered navigation view

    Note this class is currently under early design and development. The API will likely change in later updates of the compatibility library, requiring changes to the source code of apps when they are compiled against the newer version.

    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co. All rights reserved.
